full_text: Fwd: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death From Hugh Hurwitz To [redacted] Date 2019/08/10 22:20 Subject: Fwd: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death Attachments: TEXT.htm Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------- Original message ------- From: Hugh Hurwitz [redacted] @bop.gov> Date: 8/10/19 10:20 PM (GMT-05:00) To: Ray Ormon [redacted] @bop.gov>, [redacted] @usdoj.gov> Subject: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death >>> "Hugh Hurwitz" 08/10/2019 22:20 >>> How do they have this info? Unbelievable. https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/HughSent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone Page 2805 DOJ-OGR-00024328

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redacted recipient and sender information. The email discusses a news article about prison guards skipping mandatory checks before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
